validations.message:
Recommended property `eventStatus` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"eventStatus": "https://schema.org/EventScheduled"
```

Recommended property `leader` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"leader": [
  {
    "@type": "Person",
    "familyName": "Smith",
    "givenName": "Nicole",
    "gender": "https://schema.org/Male",
    "@id": "https://example.com/locations/1234ABCD/leaders/89",
    "identifier": 89
  }
]
```

Recommended property `url` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"url": "https://example.com/event/1234"
```

Recommended property `description` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "A fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `ageRange` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"ageRange": {
  "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
  "minValue": 50,
  "maxValue": 60
}
```

Recommended property `genderRestriction` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"genderRestriction": "https://openactive.io/FemaleOnly"
```

Recommended property `leader` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"leader": [
  {
    "@type": "Person",
    "familyName": "Smith",
    "givenName": "Nicole",
    "gender": "https://schema.org/Male",
    "@id": "https://example.com/locations/1234ABCD/leaders/89",
    "identifier": 89
  }
]
```

Recommended property `level` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"level": [
  "Beginner"
]
```
Data consumers will assume that there is no gender restriction when no valid `genderRestriction` is supplied on a `ScheduledSession`.

Data consumers will assume the `eventStatus` is scheduled if not specified or invalid.

This `ScheduledSession` is currently assumed to have the equivalent of:

```
"eventStatus": "https://schema.org/EventScheduled"
```

validations.message:
Recommended property `eventStatus` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"eventStatus": "https://schema.org/EventScheduled"
```

Recommended property `leader` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"leader": [
  {
    "@type": "Person",
    "familyName": "Smith",
    "givenName": "Nicole",
    "gender": "https://schema.org/Male",
    "@id": "https://example.com/locations/1234ABCD/leaders/89",
    "identifier": 89
  }
]
```

Recommended property `url` is missing from `ScheduledSession`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"url": "https://example.com/event/1234"
```

Recommended property `description` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "A fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `ageRange` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"ageRange": {
  "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
  "minValue": 50,
  "maxValue": 60
}
```

Recommended property `genderRestriction` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"genderRestriction": "https://openactive.io/FemaleOnly"
```

Recommended property `leader` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"leader": [
  {
    "@type": "Person",
    "familyName": "Smith",
    "givenName": "Nicole",
    "gender": "https://schema.org/Male",
    "@id": "https://example.com/locations/1234ABCD/leaders/89",
    "identifier": 89
  }
]
```

Recommended property `level` is missing from `SessionSeries`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"level": [
  "Beginner"
]
```
Data consumers will assume that there is no gender restriction when no valid `genderRestriction` is supplied on a `ScheduledSession`.

Data consumers will assume the `eventStatus` is scheduled if not specified or invalid.

This `ScheduledSession` is currently assumed to have the equivalent of:

```
"eventStatus": "https://schema.org/EventScheduled"
```
Data consumers will assume that there is no gender restriction when no valid `genderRestriction` is supplied on a `SessionSeries`.

Data consumers will assume the `eventStatus` is scheduled if not specified or invalid.

This `SessionSeries` is currently assumed to have the equivalent of:

```
"eventStatus": "https://schema.org/EventScheduled"
```
